QuestData.Title: Lockdown!
QuestData.Description: Zhat buildink did not explode by itself!$b$bSomevone is tryink to do me in, and you von't rest until I find out who!$b$bShtaht vizh zhe guests. Visit vizh zhem, observe zheir demeanor, and zhen report back to me.$b$bIf zhey know anyzhink at all, I vill haff zhem interrogated!$b$bDismissed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Schnottz wants you to observe the guests in Schnottz's Landing.
QuestData.CompletionText: Vell, $r?$b$bVere zhe guests involved in zhe plot to haf me rubbed out?
QuestData.RewardText: Zhey know nozhink, you say?$b$bVery vell, zhen. Zhe search goes on...
